CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 10 reads: "American Bridge Tournament Closes In Pittsburgh - Closing Saturday night in Pittsburgh was one of the most successful of all ABA gatherings, which drew some 500 bridge players to Pennsylvania to spend a week vying for honors...Porter Davis, Courier bridge expert...All photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Porter Davis seated at table with three other men playing bridge, in Kay Boys Club for the Thirteenth Annual Conference of the American Bridge Association
